title: Context Sensitive Help for OO does not work for a setup with an external load balancer
content:
Context Sensitive Help for OO doesn't work for a setup with an external load balancer.

Cause

This issue occurs because path-based routing rules in the load balancer aren't configured correctly.

Solution

Configure the path-based routing rules in your load balancer to allow traffic to the OO server on the following URL paths: /oo, /oo-designer, or /process-automation-online-help

Note For Apache httpd, it's enough to make sure that the balancer members' URLs are just http://central_host:central_port/.
